name: Road Weaver (Henrik, ChikinNoodleSupp, youngheioh)
description:
The spiderlings need your help to safety! Help them by creating strings in the web that allows them to avoid crashing into other spiders or dangers that may appear

What is Road Weaver

In Road Weaver you play as a Spider God who has to help guide all the spiders across the web to reach their home. But be careful, you don't want to lose their trust by making them crash into each other or other dangers..

Controls
  • LMB:
    Create strings between nodes within the web.
  • RMB:
    Remove strings that you have placed.

The process

This game was made in a local 24 hour game jam by students from Uppsala University.
The generated theme for the jam was: Link.
